channel.title: Healthcare on Error States

item.title: Error States Roundup 011, January-February 2020
item.description: Well, January and February were interested, to say the least. For posterity, I’ve rounded up some of the more interesting things to come out related to the intersection of error handling and politics… as well as updates on the healthcare-x-machine-learning side of things and bitcoin woes. [Continue Reading]

item.title: Roundup 009, October-November 2020
item.description: I spent most of November road tripping across the country, so this roundup included both October and November news on healthcare devices, data bias, machine vision, and broken cars. [Continue Reading]
